languages.english-overview:
kPlaylist is a free PHP system that makes your music collection available via the Internet.
kPlaylist is a music database that you manage via the web. With kPlaylist you can stream your music (ogg, mp3, wav, wma, etc.), you can upload, make playlists, share, search, download and a lot more.
kPlaylist is released under the GNU/GPL license.

ul.li: Flash player support (xspf, JW FLV player.)
Video and audio support including mp3, mpeg, ogg, wma, rma ++
Network, share music with other kPlaylist sites
Icecast integration that can make kP act as a radio station
Upload, multi upload, download and multi download
Shoutbox and bulletin board to communicate with users
Randomizer function to find new and popular music
